message.content:
1. Multiple sclerosis is a condition that can cause fatigue.
2. Fatigue is one of the most common symptoms of multiple sclerosis.
3. Fatigue is one of the most disabling symptoms of multiple sclerosis.

messages.content:
Statement: In multiple sclerosis (MS), fatigue is rated as one of the most common and disabling symptoms.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
